about_the_game:
Game Introduction:

After the "3059 Electronic Plague" incident, in order to prevent the expansion of the impact of electronic plague, Animo sapiens and Homo sapiens collaborated to restrict and block the development of consciousness technology, resulting in a huge change in the world landscape.

Century passed, there is a legend in the world that there exists an identity called "shade" that can capture and detain special artificial intelligence residing in specific consciousness technology products to meet any needs. And the identity of the "shaded" can also be given or plundered.

As an ordinary Animo sapiens college student, Liu Qiao never believed in these strange rumors, but did not realize that he was embroiled embroiled in a dispute about the identity of "shaded ". From this, the story of "Co|incidence" began...

Game features:

·"Co|Incidence" is a FVN produced for Renpy.

·Combine art forms related to liminal space (includingweirdcore,dreamcore, traumacore, poolcore, back room, etc.) with science fiction worldview.

·The game has only one storyline and a fixed couple.

Warning:

·This game contains thrilling, jump scare, weird and Same-Sex Relationships，sexual assault/non-consensual sex, BDSM, self-harm, etc.

·Based on Renpy's save mechanism, the trial version and save will be directly migrated to that Steam version, but please do not read those files, otherwise there may be bugs due to content deletion.

·Based on Renpy's dialogue mechanism, saving and reading files when there is a character head in the dialog box will cause a bug where the head will disappear and appear earlier, which cannot be solved temporarily. If possible, please avoid saving in conversations when any character head appears.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains thrilling, jump scare, weird and Same-Sex Relationships，sexual assault/non-consensual sex, BDSM, self-harm, etc

detailed_description:
Game Introduction:

After the "3059 Electronic Plague" incident, in order to prevent the expansion of the impact of electronic plague, Animo sapiens and Homo sapiens collaborated to restrict and block the development of consciousness technology, resulting in a huge change in the world landscape.

Century passed, there is a legend in the world that there exists an identity called "shade" that can capture and detain special artificial intelligence residing in specific consciousness technology products to meet any needs. And the identity of the "shaded" can also be given or plundered.

As an ordinary Animo sapiens college student, Liu Qiao never believed in these strange rumors, but did not realize that he was embroiled embroiled in a dispute about the identity of "shaded ". From this, the story of "Co|incidence" began...

Game features:

·"Co|Incidence" is a FVN produced for Renpy.

·Combine art forms related to liminal space (includingweirdcore,dreamcore, traumacore, poolcore, back room, etc.) with science fiction worldview.

·The game has only one storyline and a fixed couple.

Warning:

·This game contains thrilling, jump scare, weird and Same-Sex Relationships，sexual assault/non-consensual sex, BDSM, self-harm, etc.

·Based on Renpy's save mechanism, the trial version and save will be directly migrated to that Steam version, but please do not read those files, otherwise there may be bugs due to content deletion.

·Based on Renpy's dialogue mechanism, saving and reading files when there is a character head in the dialog box will cause a bug where the head will disappear and appear earlier, which cannot be solved temporarily. If possible, please avoid saving in conversations when any character head appears.
